name: As one die, another live
description:
In this game, you play and human discovering the magic of chaos.

Be careful, powers come at a cost

As one die,  another live.

- To hide the console download the game.

- If there are any problems with the resolution download the game.

- In the folder that is download read the txt name info

Game by Jamil Nahdi in 7 days for the Brackeys Game Jam 6
